name: ChronicKidneyDiseaseStage4
title: Chronic Kidney Disease, Stage 4
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to stage 4 chronic kidney disease.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes stage 4 chronic kidney disease and dual-diagnosis terms (e.g., Hypertensive heart AND chronic kidney disease stage 4).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes other stages of chronic kidney disease.)
